overview: In Cirebon, Cecep is captivated by a beautiful female dancers who come from Kasepuhan Palace named Dewi (Arumi Bachsin) during the Cirebon Culture Carnival. Tit for tat, but the barrier comes from Surya (Ferry Ardiansyah), son of batik trader (Kadir), which likes Dewi also. Dewiâ€™s mother also does not want her daughter to have a husband from poor families.
title: Musik Untuk Cinta
